text: Laughter is the fourth EP released by Tiny Vipers. It is the first major solo album released by Tiny Vipers in eight years. https://pitchfork.com/reviews/albums/23169-tiny-vipers-laughter/ Laughter was created by Jesy Fortino while she was at the University of Washington studying civil engineering. It is a departure from previous major solo albums in that it relies mostly on synths and keyboards.https://www.npr.org/sections/allsongs/2017/03/24/521133338/tiny- vipers-returns-with-first-album-in-8-years-shares-synthetic-hymnal-k-i-s-s ==Track listing== All songs written by Jesy Fortino. # "Boarding Charon's Boat" – 2:19 # "Crossing the River of Yourself" – 6:25 # "Living on a Curve" – 9:46 # "K.I.S.S." – 4:13 # "The Summing of Moments" - 3:53 # "Laughter" - 14:22 ==References== Category:2017 albums Category:Tiny Vipers albums Category:Ba Da Bing Records albums
title: Laughter (EP)
